page.title: Account
page.description: Sign in to your account or create a new one
page.metaDescription: Sign in to your account to manage your orders, address book, and preferences. New customers can create an account in just a few steps.
page.comingSoon: This page is coming soon. Content will be available here shortly.

passwordRecovery.title: Recover Password
passwordRecovery.description: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password

success.title: Password Recovery Requested
success.message: If the email exists in our system, we'll send instructions to reset your password

passwordRecovery.resetSuccess: Your password has been successfully reset! You can now sign in with your new password.
passwordRecovery.resetError: Failed to reset password. The link may be invalid or expired.

registration.title: Create Account
registration.dataProtection: I accept the privacy policy and terms of service
registration.doubleOptInMessage: Please check your email at {email} and click the confirmation link to activate your account.
registration.confirmDescription: Please wait while we confirm your account registration.
registration.confirmSuccess: Your account has been successfully confirmed! You can now log in.
registration.confirmError: Registration confirmation failed. The link may be invalid or expired.

account.overviewInfo: Welcome to your account dashboard. Here you can manage your profile, view your orders, and update your settings.
account.overviewNotAbleToShip: We are unable to ship to your default shipping address country.
account.overviewCustomerGroupRequest: Your request to join the customer group '{group}' is being processed.

profile.title: Profile Settings
profile.description: Update your personal information, password, and account preferences.
profile.personalDataInfo: Update your personal information below. Changes will be saved to your account.
profile.changePasswordInfo: Change your password to keep your account secure. You'll need to enter your current password.
profile.changeEmailInfo: Change your email address. You'll need to confirm your password for security.

messages.passwordChangeFailed: Failed to change password. Please check your current password.
messages.emailChangeRequested: Email change requested! Please check your new email for confirmation.
messages.emailChangeFailed: Failed to change email. Please check your password and try again.

address.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this address?
address.noAddressesDescription: Add your first address to make checkout faster and easier.
address.shippingNotAvailable: Shipping not available to this country
address.setDefaultBillingError: Failed to set default billing address
address.setDefaultShippingError: Failed to set default shipping address
